channel.title: :Rage: bodywork
channel.description:
Seriously makes me angry, I see so many cars with shit body work like this:
[img]http://s.bebo.com/app-image/7926376935/5411656627/PROFILE/i.quizzaz.com/img/q/u/08/04/08/2063258671a3856172846b568101893l.jpg[/img]
Why do people do this? It makes them look so bad. It may give a bit more grip but it must slow the car down a fuckton.
[img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/car.jpg[/img]

item.title: :Rage: bodywork
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Ever been to Essex? teheeehe

item.title: :Rage: bodywork
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:22, topic:312162”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=408604.msg3016333#msg3016333 date=1257212712]
Here we call them rice-burners, all show and no go. Anyone who does that kind of stuff is an idiot and I love flipping them the bird and taking off faster then they ever dreamed of.
[/quote]

Ah man this is what I love to do to people who drive fucking ridiculously loud mustangs who think that sound=power, then they cant accelerate fast enough to keep up haha![/quote]
Them V8s=Power

item.title: :Rage: bodywork
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:14, topic:312162”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=408604.msg3042508#msg3042508 date=1259220272]
It could possibly improve fuel efficiency.
[/quote]IIIIII don’t think so. I may be wrong, but I don’t see how…[/quote]

Some may be streamlined.

Read full topic

item.title: :Rage: bodywork
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:8, topic:312162”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=408604.msg3016624#msg3016624 date=1257245357]
Here in the Netherlands we have a lot of these cars driving around. About 80% of the owners spend so much money on their car, that they are hardly able to pay their other bills. Those people should be properly educated, because what happens when they get older?
[/quote]

It is strange, and I don’t like to say this but a lot of people who live in tiny flats for some reason like to spend their money on expensive cars and 52" plasma screen tvs. I don’t see why they don’t spend it on something more useful like a better house.[/quote]

Maybe because they don’t need/want a better house? Maybe they spend more time out and about rather than in their house and if it’s only them there then they don’t actually need a 2-4 bedroom house.

Read full topic

item.title: :Rage: bodywork
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

There are normal cars that are so fucked up with shit like this that they can’t even go over a speed bump.

runescape3dude:

It could possibly improve fuel efficiency.

The ‘spoilers’ don’t really create down force or anything. They just make the car heavier.

Read full topic

item.title: :Rage: bodywork
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:13, topic:312162”]It could possibly improve fuel efficiency.[/quote]IIIIII don’t think so. I may be wrong, but I don’t see how…

Man, Davidude, every time I see those pieces of shit driving around it makes me mad, and it infuriates me more when someone says “Wow, that looks sweet!” … No, it just looks stupid.

Read full topic

item.description:
@sppt wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

Here in the Netherlands we have a lot of these cars driving around. About 80% of the owners spend so much money on their car, that they are hardly able to pay their other bills. Those people should be properly educated, because what happens when they get older?

Today was the first time I really saw something like that.

Read full topic

[quote=“Davidude, post:8, topic:312162”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=408604.msg3016624#msg3016624 date=1257245357]
Here in the Netherlands we have a lot of these cars driving around. About 80% of the owners spend so much money on their car, that they are hardly able to pay their other bills. Those people should be properly educated, because what happens when they get older?
[/quote]

It is strange, and I don’t like to say this but a lot of people who live in tiny flats for some reason like to spend their money on expensive cars and 52" plasma screen tvs. I don’t see why they don’t spend it on something more useful like a better house.[/quote]

Maybe that’s why they live in tiny flats?
